imdb.plot outline: Bogus and Humbug (Fup & Svindel in Danish) live together in a small circus wagon, only two centimeters high. Humbug is the annoying father figure and the miniature version of a pipe smoking know-it-all. He's an old-school magician, with one or two tricks up his sleeve. Bogus is the youngest of the two, always eager to express his emotions, or pull a cunning practical joke on his old friend. He too is a small magician, and loves to go on adventures several centimeters away from the circus wagon. The two friends love to tease each other, and live through their own version of a father and son-drama, every day, in scale 1:32.
imdb.title: Fup & Svindel
plot: Bogus and Humbug (_Fup & Svindel_ (qv) in Danish) live together in a small circus wagon, only two centimeters high. Humbug is the annoying father figure and the miniature version of a pipe smoking know-it-all. He's an old-school magician, with one or two tricks up his sleeve. Bogus is the youngest of the two, always eager to express his emotions, or pull a cunning practical joke on his old friend. He too is a small magician, and loves to go on adventures several centimeters away from the circus wagon. The two friends love to tease each other, and live through their own version of a father and son-drama, every day, in scale 1:32.::Petter Lindblad
